alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 3:05PM MST until December 20 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...ADDITIONAL SNOW THROUGH MONDAY NIGHT FOR THE INLAND NORTHWEST... .Additional snowfall is expected for southeast Washington and central Idaho through Monday evening. Parts of the Cascade Mountains and mountain passes will see heavy snow during this time. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 9 inches. * WHERE...Fourth Of July Pass, Wallace, Osburn, Dobson Pass, Kellogg, Fernwood, St. Maries, Lookout Pass, Mullan, and Pinehurst. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Wet and heavy snow will make driving on unplowed roads difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
